name: Simple Single Tenant Industrial
description: Basic single-tenant deal with all key info
prompt: Build me an acquisition model for a 50,000 SF industrial building in Houston, TX. Purchase price is $5M, 65% LTV, 5.75% interest rate. Single tenant paying $9.50 PSF NNN with 3% annual bumps, lease expires in 2030. Plan to hold for 5 years and exit at a 6.5% cap rate.
